item.description:
Debby will be hosting a Potluck for our Meetup Group on February 20th at 6:00 p.m. at her home is Wakefield.

Please bring your favorite or new Vegan dish and BYOB. Our Potlucks are always a great success so if you haven’t had an opportunity to attend one yet we look forward to seeing you on February 20th!

Please remember to RSVP and feel free to bring a friend or two.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Debby’s Place
